alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 7:23AM MDT until May 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Bon Homme, Hutchinson and Yankton Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, approximately 4400 acres of farm land are flooded between Mitchell and Yankton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:46 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:46 AM CDT Sunday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday afternoon and continue falling to 12.8 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed James River Scotland 13.0 14.4 Sun 7 am 14.1 13.8 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
